snippet.title: Chasing the Unseen - Announcement Trailer (Now Out on Steam)
snippet.description:
This is a game about climbing colossal creatures in fractal environments, coming up on Steam.
The game is now available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2143420/Chasing_the_Unseen/

The trailer showcases pre-alpha gameplay footage.

#gaming #indiegame 

Trailer music by Gregor Quendel
Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
https://freesound.org/people/GregorQuendel/sounds/511070/
https://freesound.org/people/GregorQuendel/sounds/578724/
The audio material is available under Public License.
Some trailer images contain the Mandelbrot set.

Chasing the Unseen uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2023, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.

Chasing the Unseen © 2023 Strange Shift Studio Inc. All rights reserved.
